
ECD country dictionary
A data dictionary with the countries in our dataset and their corresponding file names on Github

### Description

ECD country dictionary
A data dictionary with the countries in our dataset and their corresponding file names on Github



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>ecd_country_dictionary
</code></pre>


### Format



<h4><code>ecd_country_dictionary</code></h4>

a data frame with 41 rows and 2 columns


<dl>
<dt>name_in_dataset</dt><dd>Name of the country in the dataset
</dd>
<dt>file_name</dt><dd>Name of the parquet files on GitHub
</dd></dl>




### Source

The Executive Communications Dataset
